scripts.build: gitfolio build cederache -f --twitter DeracheCedric --linkedin c√©dric-derache-1b5bb575 --theme dark --background scotland.JPG
scripts.copy: cp -r dist/* . && sed 's/<\/body>/<script src=\"autoRefresh.js\"><\/script><\/body>/' index.html > index2.html && rm index.html && mv index2.html index.html
scripts.refresh: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run delete
scripts.dev: npm run build && sed 's/<\/body>/<script src=\"autoRefresh.js\"><\/script><\/body>/' dist/index.html > index2.html && rm dist/index.html && mv index2.html dist/index.html && cp autoRefresh.js dist/autoRefresh.js && gitfolio run -p 3002
